---
title: "Taking an H2O Model to Production"
output: html_notebook
---

Source: http://projects.rajivshah.com/blog/2016/08/22/H2O_prod/

```{r}
library(h2o)  
library(Ecdat)  
data(Icecream)  
h2o.init()  
train.h2o <- as.h2o(Icecream)  
rf <- h2o.randomForest(x=2:4, y=1, ntrees=2, training_frame=train.h2o)   
```


```{r}
h2o.download_pojo(rf, getjar=TRUE, path=".")
# you must give a path to download a file
```
